name: Liquinity
description: Liquinity is an ERC-20 token avoiding the small-cap liquidity crisis by directing 100% of trading fees to the LP. LQNTY is designed to translate token volume into deep liquidity. Buys and sells feed Liqqy (LP) for the next round of traders. Through continuous liquidity provisioning, this is a community-led token, is set to provide a healthy LP to it's holders.
